snippet: Ackeem Green, a member of the Harlem Youth Marines, a group that uses military tradition and rules to help youngsters avoid trouble, was shot and killed on June 3.
abstract: Ackeem Green, a member of the Harlem Youth Marines, a group that uses military tradition and rules to help youngsters avoid trouble, was shot and killed on June 3.

headline.main: Young Cadets Mourn a Comrade, Felled by Gunfire in Harlem
headline.print_headline: Young Cadets Mourn a Comrade, Felled by Gunfire in Harlem
